sn42.5:1.1: Atha kho assaroho gamani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho assaroho gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.5:1.2: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam assarohanam bhasamananam:
sn42.5:1.3: ‘yo so assaroho sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.5:1.5: “Alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi”ti.
sn42.5:2.2: tatiyampi kho assaroho gamani bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn42.5:2.3: “sutam metam, bhante, pubbakanam acariyapacariyanam assarohanam bhasamananam:
sn42.5:2.4: ‘yo so assaroho sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti.
sn42.5:3.2: ‘alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi’ti.
sn42.5:3.4: Yo so, gamani, assaroho sangame ussahati vayamati tassa tam cittam pubbe gahitam dukkatam duppanihitam:
sn42.5:3.5: ‘ime satta hannantu va bajjhantu va ucchijjantu va vinassantu va ma ahesum iti va’ti.
sn42.5:3.6: Tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajito nama nirayo tattha upapajjati.
sn42.5:3.7: Sace kho panassa evam ditthi hoti:
sn42.5:3.8: ‘yo so assaroho sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’ti, sassa hoti micchaditthi.
sn42.5:3.9: Micchaditthikassa kho panaham, gamani, purisapuggalassa dvinnam gatinam annataram gatim vadami—
sn42.5:4.1: Evam vutte, assaroho gamani parodi, assuni pavattesi.
sn42.5:4.3: ‘alam, gamani, titthatetam; ma mam etam pucchi’”ti.
sn42.5:4.4: “Naham, bhante, etam rodami yam mam bhagava evamaha.
sn42.5:4.5: Api caham, bhante, pubbakehi acariyapacariyehi assarohehi digharattam nikato vancito paluddho:
sn42.5:4.6: ‘yo so assaroho sangame ussahati vayamati, tamenam ussahantam vayamantam pare hananti pariyapadenti, so kayassa bheda param marana parajitanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati’”ti.
